metadata.title: CVE-2023-6873 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 120. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
